home.meta_title: Mortholme - Embrace the Dark Queen's Challenge
home.meta_description: Assume the role of the Dark Queen, defend your lair against relentless heroes, and explore the depths of your own power in this unique reverse boss battle adventure.
home.intro: Cookie Clicker is an addictive idle game where you click to produce cookies and build your empire. Here are the main features:

latest_codes.title: Latest Cookie Clicker Updates
latest_codes.code1: New Building: Fractal Engine - Produces cookies through dimensional manipulation.
latest_codes.code2: New Achievement: Cookie Singularity - Reach 1 quintillion cookies per second.
latest_codes.update_note: Stay updated with the latest Cookie Clicker features by bookmarking this page!

how_to_redeem.title: How to Use Cookie Clicker Features
how_to_redeem.intro: Maximizing your cookie production is simple. Follow these steps:
how_to_redeem.step1: Start by clicking the big cookie.
how_to_redeem.note: Remember to check for Golden Cookies regularly for bonus effects.

tips.title: Tips for Cookie Clicker Success
tips.tip1: Always watch for Golden Cookies appearing.
tips.tip2: Invest in the most efficient buildings first.
tips.tip3: Use the Stock Market during Frenzy effects.
tips.conclusion: With these tips, you'll be a cookie master in no time!

cookie_clicker.title: Mortholme
cookie_clicker.subtitle: Step into the Shadows of the Dark Queen's Realm
cookie_clicker.description: Assume the role of the Dark Queen, defend your lair against relentless heroes, and explore the depths of your own power in this unique reverse boss battle adventure.

features.title: Immerse Yourself in the Dark Realm of Mortholme
features.subtitle: Discover the captivating features of Mortholme, the ultimate villain experience. Explore a dark world filled with power, strategy, and epic boss battles with friends.

item1.title: Reverse Boss Battles
item1.description: Experience the game from the boss's perspective, defending against heroes who challenge your dominion.

item2.title: Dynamic Narrative
item2.description: Engage in a compelling story that explores themes of power, persistence, and change, influenced by your choices.

item3.title: Atmospheric Pixel Art
item3.description: Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy world brought to life with detailed pixel art and a haunting soundtrack.

abilities.title: Dark Queen's Arsenal of Powers
abilities.subtitle: Master an array of devastating abilities to defend your domain against heroic invasions

item1.title: Shadow Strike
item1.description: Unleash a swift attack from the shadows, catching heroes off guard and dealing significant damage.

item2.title: Dark Aura
item2.description: Emit an aura of darkness that weakens nearby heroes, reducing their attack power and resolve.

item3.title: Summon Minions
item3.description: Call forth loyal minions to assist in battle, overwhelming heroes with numbers and strategy.

item4.title: Teleportation
item4.description: Instantly relocate within your lair, evading attacks and positioning yourself for a counterstrike.

item5.title: Life Drain
item5.description: Drain the life force of heroes to heal your wounds, turning their strength into your advantage.

item6.title: Fear Induction
item6.description: Instill fear into the hearts of heroes, causing them to hesitate or flee, giving you the upper hand.

cta.title: Are You Ready to Defend Your Throne?
cta.description: Embrace your role as the Dark Queen, master your powers, and face the heroes who dare to challenge you. Begin your reign now!

item1.question: How do I start the game?
item1.answer: Click the "Play Now" button, register an account, and immerse yourself in the world of Mortholme.

item2.question: Is the game free to play?
item2.answer: Yes, Mortholme is completely free, offering all players a full and engaging experience.

item3.question: Is multiplayer mode available?
item3.answer: Currently, the game focuses on a single-player narrative. Future updates may introduce cooperative multiplayer modes.

item4.question: Can I save my progress?
item4.answer: Yes, the game automatically saves your progress, allowing you to pick up where you left off.

item5.question: What platforms are supported?
item5.answer: Mortholme is available on PC and Mac. Mobile support may be introduced in future updates.

reviews.title: Player Reviews
reviews.subtitle: See what players are saying about The Dark Queen of Mortholme

items.title: The Dark Queen Experience
items.content: Playing as the Dark Queen of Mortholme is incredibly refreshing. The shadow abilities in Mortholme are well designed, though some cooldowns feel a bit long.
items.author: - Dark Fantasy Fan

items.title: Mortholme Needs More Content
items.content: The Dark Queen's arsenal in Mortholme has great potential, but could use more variety in hero types. The current roster gets predictable.
items.author: - RPG Veteran

items.title: Mortholme's Atmosphere
items.content: The Dark Queen's castle in Mortholme and its haunting soundtrack create perfect immersion. The gothic atmosphere is incredible!
items.author: - Art Enthusiast

items.title: Strategic Depth in Mortholme
items.content: As the Dark Queen, each hero requires different tactics. The shadow strike combo with minion support makes Mortholme truly engaging.
items.author: - Strategy Master

items.title: Balancing in Mortholme
items.content: The Dark Queen's life drain ability in Mortholme needs slight buffing. Some hero combinations feel nearly impossible to beat.
items.author: - Hardcore Gamer

items.title: Mortholme's Story
items.content: The Dark Queen's journey in Mortholme unfolds beautifully through gameplay. Each hero brings their own tale to challenge your reign.
items.author: - Story Lover

items.title: Innovative Mortholme Mechanics
items.content: The fear induction system in Mortholme adds depth to the Dark Queen's arsenal. Love how it affects hero behavior in the castle.
items.author: - Game Designer

items.title: Mortholme's Potential
items.content: The Dark Queen's teleportation in Mortholme feels a bit clunky, but the core gameplay of defending your castle is solid.
items.author: - Beta Tester

items.title: Perfect Challenge in Mortholme
items.content: The Dark Queen's journey from facing weak heroes to legendary champions in Mortholme is perfectly paced.
items.author: - Challenge Seeker

items.title: Dark Queen's Powers
items.content: Mortholme's Dark Aura ability needs work, but the overall power fantasy of being the Dark Queen is amazing.
items.author: - Balance Expert

items.title: Addictive Mortholme Gameplay
items.content: Can't stop defending the Dark Queen's castle! Mortholme's minion summoning system adds great tactical depth.
items.author: - Regular Player

items.title: Mixed Feelings on Mortholme
items.content: The Dark Queen's castle looks beautiful, but some hero patterns in Mortholme become too predictable. Needs more variety.
items.author: - Casual Gamer

items.title: Mortholme Combat Excellence
items.content: The Dark Queen's shadow strike and teleport combinations in Mortholme create exciting moments. Boss fights done right!
items.author: - Combat Enthusiast

items.title: Promising Start for Mortholme
items.content: The Dark Queen's abilities have good foundation, but Mortholme needs more endgame content. Castle defense gets repetitive.
items.author: - Content Creator

items.title: Mortholme's Visual Appeal
items.content: The Dark Queen's realm in Mortholme is stunning. The dark fantasy setting and pixel art style blend perfectly.
items.author: - Pixel Artist

items.title: Strategic Depth of Mortholme
items.content: Each hero requires unique strategies against the Dark Queen. Mortholme's arsenal offers great tactical options.
items.author: - Tactics Expert

items.title: Mortholme UI Feedback
items.content: The Dark Queen's ability cooldowns in Mortholme could be clearer, but the core gameplay is incredibly solid.
items.author: - UX Designer

items.title: Unique Boss Battles in Mortholme
items.content: Being the Dark Queen is refreshing! Mortholme's hero variety keeps each defense of the castle interesting.
items.author: - Boss Battle Fan

items.title: Mortholme's Atmosphere
items.content: The Dark Queen's castle ambience in Mortholme is perfect. The dark soundtrack and ability effects create amazing immersion.
items.author: - Audio Enthusiast

items.title: Mortholme's Challenge
items.content: Some hero combinations against the Dark Queen feel unfair. Mortholme needs a better difficulty curve.
items.author: - Seasoned Player

items.title: Unique Mortholme Experience
items.content: The Dark Queen's perspective in Mortholme offers fresh gameplay. Minor bugs don't detract from the dark fantasy fun.
items.author: - Innovation Seeker

items.title: Growing Potential of Mortholme
items.content: The Dark Queen's shadow abilities in Mortholme form a solid foundation. Excited for future content updates!
items.author: - Early Adopter

items.title: Memorable Mortholme Adventure
items.content: Defending the Dark Queen's castle in Mortholme never gets old. Each hero brings unique challenges to overcome.
items.author: - Adventure Gamer

items.title: Worth Playing Mortholme
items.content: Despite some balance issues, The Dark Queen of Mortholme offers a unique take on boss battles. A must-try dark fantasy experience.
items.author: - Genre Expert
